title: News: Jai Paul Streams Self-titled Debut Album?
body:
Over two years in the waiting, is appears that Jai Paul may have made his debut album (or a mixtape comprised of potential album cuts) available for streaming and purchase.

Hosted on a recently registered Bandcamp URL, the sixteen tracks are of varying quality (at least demo versions), and if not by Jai Paul himself, then a bloody good impersonator. Screw Daft Punk. Just listen.
